2

18 later version.
19
20or both in parallel, as here.

27You should have received copies of the GNU General Public License and the
28GNU Lesser General Public License along with the GNU MP Library. If not,
29see https://www.gnu.org/licenses/. */
30
31#include <stdarg.h>
32
33#include "gmp.h"
34#include "gmp-impl.h"
35
36void
37gmp_randinit (gmp_randstate_t rstate, gmp_randalg_t alg, ...)
38{
39 va_list ap;
40 va_start (ap, alg);
41
42 switch (alg) {
43 case GMP_RAND_ALG_LC:
44 if (! gmp_randinit_lc_2exp_size (rstate, va_arg (ap, unsigned long)))
45 gmp_errno |= GMP_ERROR_INVALID_ARGUMENT;
46 break;
47 default:
48 gmp_errno |= GMP_ERROR_UNSUPPORTED_ARGUMENT;
49 break;
50 }
51 va_end (ap);
52}
53
